subject: Tattoos
Bicycles and Bicycling
Cancer
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong’s confession of drug use has, for some, done little to diminish the meaning of the tattoos that bear the name of his foundation to raise cancer awareness.
snippet: Lance Armstrong’s confession of drug use has, for some, done little to diminish the meaning of the tattoos that bear the name of his foundation to raise cancer awareness.
